job.title: Software Engineer, Test
job.description:
At Genesys, we’ve built the best cloud-based Customer Experience (CX) service offerings, which handles millions of interactions a day. Our infrastructure involves hundreds of services deployed across 9 environments globally, and we push out dozens of product builds per day using a top-notch CI/CD pipeline.

We are looking for a talented Software Engineer, Test to work with our Data Analytics team focusing on automated testing of big data processing and batch data actions.

Responsibilities
  • Help develop new features for our platform service with quality built in.
  • Triage failed automated test executions and report defects when appropriate.
  • Participating in code reviews, direct collaboration, and open discussion of ongoing work.
  • Develop automation for new features and processes.
  • Assist development teams on testing best practices.
  • Determine whether to deploy new code to production regions.
Requirements
  • A Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or related degree or equivalent in work experience.
  • Proficiency using Java.
  • Previous experience using test frameworks like Selenium and TestNG.
  • Understanding of cloud computing, ideally AWS.
Nice To Have
  • Agile/Scrum experience.
  • Best practices for CI/CD.
  • Proficiency using Python.
  • Experience testing RESTful API’s
  • Experience with big data tools like Apache Spark.
  • Experience with Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR)
  • Experience using version control systems like GitHub and BitBucket.
Benefits
  • Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance
  • Telehealth coverage
  • Flexible work schedules and work from home opportunities
  • Development and career growth opportunities
  • Open Time Off
  • 401(k) matching program
  • Adoption Assistance
  • Infertility treatments
See more Genesys benefits information at https://mygenesysbenefits.com/
